TopicTitle: Role Playing for newer Kerbonauts! (With free training!)

Articles.Content:
Hello!

At this website called "Modern Kerbin" there is roleplayings galore!

http://modernkerbin.weebly.com/

I am one of the first people to join, so I know just how fun it is to start from the bottom and work up!

Create a nation, own a colony, a space station, or more!

Declare WAR on other nations! Bomb their cities from orbital missile revenues, and send in your kerbally army to raid their colonies!

Being an astrophysicist, I know quite a bit about rockets, and I am totally willing to educate anyone who wants to learn.

I love being able to help another generation learn about this sort of stuff, and it just brings a smile to my face. I can teach you

all about atmosphere resistance, Delta V, Aerodynamics, how to establish an orbit, how to make a good rover or lander,

and how to get it up to wherever it is you want to be!

Nobody is a lost cause! I guarantee it! I can teach even the hardest of pupils, so if you are willing to learn, I am ready to teach!

So, I hope you all consider joining soon, and keep looking up.

-Tom

i have stranded many kerbals in space, they will be most gracious for your advice.

joined.
Could I, for example, be a company that has some money and allows newer players to have contracts from me?
Just got to ask, is this on Kerbal multiplayer? or is it a kinda post the images of your missions thing?

Just got to ask, is this on Kerbal multiplayer? or is it a kinda post the images of your missions thing?

This is all about NOT being Kerbal Multiplayer. We all play on the same save file. Easy breezy.

You must understand Lexi Silvia, it is very easy to earn money in this version of the game, you simply have to do misisons, or wait. Then you gain 80,000 a day. Each rocket costs about 50,000 for a medium sized one, so that is a very substantial amount.

Also, you can learn all of these things on the page I posted in the top of the thread. www.modernkerbin.weebly.com
